pipeline module¶

class pipeline.Pipeline(data_folder='Data', models_folder='Models', working_folder='Working_Folder', sim_data_folder='sim_data', sim_plots_folder='sim_plots')¶

Generic pipeline.

config_parser(config_file, section)¶
get_data_folder()¶

Return the folder containing the experimental (wet) data sets. :return: the experimental data sets folder.

get_models_folder()¶

Return the folder containing the models. :return: the models folder.

get_sim_data_folder()¶

Return the folder containing the in-silico generated data sets. :return: the folder of the simulated data sets.

get_sim_plots_folder()¶

Return the folder containing the in-silico generated plots. :return: the folder of the simulated plots.

get_working_folder()¶

Return the folder containing the results. :return: the working folder.

read_common_configuration(lines)¶

Parse the common parameters from the configuration file :return: return a tuple containing the common parameters

read_configuration(lines)¶

Read the section lines from the configuration file :return: a tuple containing the configuration

run(config_file)¶

Run the pipeline.

Parameters:config_file – a configuration file for this pipeline.
Returns:0 if the pipeline was executed correctly, 1 if the pipeline executed but some output was skipped, 2 if the pipeline did not execute correctly.
